data.text: “Nimmakiangite go li'nga mwaakane ku'bala muimani yinu.
Bandu balu'a kummi'nga mwenga mumayumba gabe ga kunnu'ba Nnu'ngu'. Kai' nsimu wendaisa wa kila ywaalu'a kummulaga mwenga, aakita antumikia Nnu'ngu'.
Baalu'a kumpangya go kwa mwanjaa baatangiteli Tati', wala banitangiteli nenga.
Bai, nimmakiangite makowe ga li'nga payaika saa yake mwaku'mbu'ki panga nammakiangite.
Nambi'yambi' ninnyendelya ywanitumike, na ntu'pu' ata yumo ywanilaluya panga, ‘Uyenda kwaku'?’
Kwa mwanjaa nimmakiangite makowe go, myoyo yinu itwi'li manyingipalo.
Lakini nimmakianga, nantali yinu nenga niyende, mwanjaa mana nikotwike yenda, Nnyangatiyi aisali. Lakini mana niyi'i nalu'a kuntuma kasinu.
Naywembe paaisa alu'a kwakong'ondelya bandu ba padunia bu'kana na sambi, aki na ukumu ya Nnu'ngu'.
Bu'kana na sambi, mwanjaa baniu'bi'lyali,
bu'kana na aki, mwanjaa niyenda kwa Tati', namwe mwanibonali kai',
bu'kana na ukumu, mwanjaa mpi'ndo ywa dunia yi'no ayomwike ukumilwa.
“Nibinago maingi ga kummakianga, ila kwa nambi'yambi' mukombwali kugakomeya.
Lakini paalu'a isa aywo Loo ywa kakape alu'a kunnongoya muukakape woti, mwanjaa aalongelali kwa utawala wake mwene, ila aabaya gaagayu'wa na kummakianga gagalu'a isa.
Ywembe anikwi'ya nenga, kwa mwanjaa alu'a kummakianga galu' gaalu'a kugapata bu'ka kasangu'.
Goti gababilenago Tati' nga gangu', mwanjaa nibaite panga aywo Loo alu'a kummakianga galu' gaalu'a kugapata bu'ka kasangu'.
“Balo masu'ba masene namwe mwanibonali, no bu'ka pa masu'ba masene kai' mwanibona.”

Apo bi'ngi' ba banamasi' bake ngabalaluyana, “Alombolya namani patubakia, ‘Balo masu'ba masene namwe mwanibonali, no bu'ka pa masu'ba masene mwanibona kai'?’ Kai' abaya, ‘Kwa mwanjaa nendayenda kwa Tati'!’”
Bai ngabalaluyana, “Alombolya namani pabaya, ‘Balo masu'ba masene?’ Tutangiteli alongela ki'li'.”
Yesu aatangite panga baapalike kunnaluya, bai ngaabakia, “Buli, mulaluyana galu' ganimmakie panga, ‘Balo masu'ba masene namwe mwanibonali, no bu'ka pa masu'ba masene mwanibona kai'?’
Kakape nimmakianga, mwenga mwali'la no lombola, lakini bandu ba dunia balu'a napusika, mwalu'a nyopa, lakini nyopa kwinu kwagalambuka panga pulaa.
Nnwawa pakomboka endanyopa kwa mwanjaa saa yake ya lwu'ngu' yikite, lakini mana akombwike aku'mbu'kyali kai' lwu'ngu' lwo kwa mwanjaa ya pulaa panga mundu abelekwile padunia.
Kai' mwenga nambi'yambi' mwendanyopa, lakini nalu'a kumwisilyanga kai', na mwenga myoyo yinu yatwi'lya pulaa, na pulaa yo ntu'pu' mundu ywaalu'a kwibu'ya kasinu.
Lisu'ba lyo mwanilaluyali sosoti. Kakape nimmakianga, sosoti samwalu'a kwalu'ba Tati' kwa lina lyangu' bampeyanga.
Mpaka nambi'yambi' munalu'bali sosoti kwa lina lyangu'. Mulu'bange na mwenga mwapata li'nga pulaa yinu itimi.
“Nimmakiangite makowe go kwa ngongo. Lakini nsimu waaisa wanalongelali namwenga kwa ngongo, ila nalu'a kummakianga mpu'la abali ya Tati'.
Lisu'ba lyo mwalu'a lu'ba kwa lina lyangu', na nimmakiangali panga nalu'a kunnu'ba Tati' paali pinu mwenga,
mwanjaa ywembe endakumpenda mwenga, kwa mwanjaa mwenga munipendi nenga na mwu'bi'li panga nibu'ka kwa Nnu'ngu'.
Nenga naumi kwa Tati', isa mudunia, na nambi'yambi' niileka dunia no ki'li'bu'kya kwa Tati'.”
Bai banamasi' bake ngabammakia, “Kumbe! Nambi'yambi' ulongela mpu'la wangali ngongo.
Nambi'yambi' tutangite panga wenga utangite kila kili'be, na ntu'pu' kitumbu so laluyilwa maswali na mundu ywoywoti, kwa nyo tuu'bi'lile panga waumi kwa Nnu'ngu'.”
Yesu ngaayangwa, “Buli nambi'yambi' mwu'bi'lile?
Nsimu wendaisa, kai' uikite wa mwenga mwaboti talanganika kila mundu kwa kisake, nanenga nalekelwa kisangu'. Lakini nenga nibali kisangu' mwanjaa, Tati' bai pamope nanenga.
Nimmakiangite makowe gano li'nga mupate ba na amani kwa mwanjaa mubile nkati yangu'. Mudunia mwapata siki, lakini mwikase, nenga niisindike dunia!”
